name: Pawn $hop Detective
description:
You're helping your dad run the pawnshop store and you encounter interesting characters. To get good deals, you got to make sure you give a good price for the items they wish to pawn.  But... how to know if the item is valuable? 

 A game about talking to sus pawn customers.  

Created in 48 hours for SEA gamejam 2021. 

Programming by Tan Kang Soon , Art by Lois Chng
